text: Integrated care ICT Platform to support patients, care-givers and health/social professionals in the care of dementia and Parkinson's disease with training, empowerment, sensor-based data analysis and cooperation services based on user-friendly interfaces.
title: ICT Services for Life Improvement for the Elderly.
journal: Studies in health technology and informatics
